pkgmetadata.longdescription: Optimal Estimation of Function Parameters by Iterated Linearization // Package for estimating the parameters of a nonlinear function using iterated linearization via Taylor series. Method is based on Kubacek (2000) ISBN: 80-244-0093-6. The algorithm is a generalization of the procedure given in Koning, R., Wimmer, G. and Witkovsky, V. (2014) doi:10.1088/0957-0233/25/11/115001.
